version_description: - Fixes a crash for free users of the app
- Fixes a crash for free users of the app
Fixes an issue with AirPlay while a Bluetooth audio device is connected.
Fixes an issue with AirPlay while a Bluetooth audio device is connected.
- Bug fixes
- Bug fixes

- Live TV channel navigation improvements. We’ve made it easier and quicker to get to the full channel list.
- Stability improvements and bug fixes.

- Live TV channel navigation improvements. We’ve made it easier and quicker to get to the full channel list.

- Filtering added to Live TV channel list making it easier to find channels.
- New Resume Play feature remembers where you stopped watching.
- General bug fixes and stability improvements.
